help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values
description: Ensures all ARIA attributes have valid values

list.html: <input _ngcontent-nvc-3="" aria-describedby="sizing-addon2" autofocus="" class="form-control" name="username" placeholder="Username" required="" type="text">
<input _ngcontent-nvc-3="" aria-describedby="sizing-addon2" autofocus="" class="form-control" name="password" placeholder="Password" required="" type="password">

description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation
Ensures every form element has a label
